logging._comment: log_level: 0=errors only, 1=errors and progress, 2=errors, progress and debug

markdown._comment: output_dir: directory to save the markdown file

network._comment: timeout: timeout for requests in seconds | num_retries: number of retries | retry_delay: delay between retries in seconds

polite_api._comment: provide your project details if you would like to use the CrossRef polite api (slightly faster), or if you plan to make frequent use of the OpenLibrary api. See links for details: https://www.crossref.org/documentation/retrieve-metadata/rest-api/tips-for-using-the-crossref-rest-api/ and

advanced._comment: Advanced settings. Only change if you know what you are doing.

crossref._comment: The URL for the Crossref API. Can append DOI. Not used in script, crossref.restful used instead.

openlibrary._comment: The URL for the Open Library API. Can append ISBN. Read more at https://openlibrary.org/developers/api.

googlebooks._comment: The URL for the Google Books API. Can append ISBN.
